dublinCore.dc:title: 114 SRES 17 ATS: To make effective appointment of Deputy Senate Legal Counsel.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. McConnell (for himself and Mr. Reid) submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

form.official-title: To make effective appointment of Deputy Senate Legal Counsel.

section.text: That the appointment of Morgan J. Frankel of the District of Columbia to be Deputy Senate Legal Counsel, made by the President pro tempore this day, is effective as of January 3, 2015, and the term of service of the appointee shall expire at the end of the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress.
